LanguageData.LingLongRandPowerGiver.label: Energy transmitters
LanguageData.LingLongRandPowerGiver.description: A special device that converts electricity into a special wave that can be emitted and, with the right receiver, can transmit electricity remotely.
LanguageData.LingLongRandPowerNeeder.label: Energy receivers
LanguageData.LingLongRandPowerNeeder.description: A special device that can receive an energy wave and convert it into electricity, due to technical limitations, while receiving only one band of signals
